ReportSection.title:
AGE-WELL EPIC Summer Institute, 2017
Co-Creating Possibilities: Physical Fitness to Avoid Frailty
ReportSection.ReportItem:
AGE-WELL NCE is pleased to offer this exciting and innovative training event to AGE-WELL HQP across Canada.  Our second summer institute’s theme, Physical Fitness to Avoid Frailty, will be the focal point for a week of engaging workshops, lectures, and activities on participatory, user-centred design.

The AGE-WELL EPIC Summer Institute, 2017 will provide HQP with an unparalleled opportunity to work closely with expert mentors and develop a solution that facilitates physical fitness and healthy aging to avoid frailty.  AGE-WELL solutions involve three types of “products”: technologies (e.g. home monitoring networks to encourage fitness), services (e.g. integration of a technology into community services), and policies (e.g. plans to ensure funds saved in one sector flow to another).

Summer Institute participants will be challenged to consider this year’s theme from all perspectives and to develop multi-faceted practical solutions. Throughout the week, HQP teams will work through the design process from problem definition to brainstorming and business models to prototyping, culminating in a “pitch competition” with cash prize.

AGE-WELL will book and cover the cost of accommodation (double-occupancy) at Hôtel Shediac for four nights plus breakfast, lunch, and coffee breaks. Additionally, AGE-WELL will cover the cost of roundtrip economy flights between your home airport and the Greater Moncton International Airport in New Brunswick. Some exceptions will be made for trainees who, due to geography, will need to travel to Moncton on July 3rd and require an extra hotel night. We expect to have a mid-afternoon start on 4 July and early afternoon end on 8 July.

AGE-WELL will organize shuttle service from the Greater Moncton International Airport to Hôtel Shediac and again from Hôtel Shediac to the airport on Saturday.

AGE-WELL will not provide HQP dinner, a per diem, or cover the cost of luggage fees. Please see the AGE-WELL Travel Policy for more details and contact krystle@agewell-nce.ca if you have any questions.

Requests for additional funding (e.g. extra hotel night) will be considered upon request. Please include details in your application.

Who: AGE-WELL HQP only
What: EPIC Summer Institute – Co-Creating Possibilities: Physical Fitness to Avoid Frailty
Where: Hôtel Shediac, Shediac, New Brunswick
When: July 4-8, 2017

Eligibility:

Applicants must be current AGE-WELL HQP in good standing (e.g. have completed reporting requirements, returned all signed documents etc.) Preference will be given to HQP who have made measurable progress towards completing, or have completed, the EPIC (Early Professionals, Inspired Careers) training program If accepted, HQP must attend the entire summer institute and commit to working actively with their teammates

Application Requirements:

  • Fully completed application form
  • Current CV

Application Procedure:

Please answer each question thoroughly and enter your typed single-spaced responses into the text boxes provided. Completed applications are due in Forum by 11:59pmET on 24 March, 2017.

Selection Procedure:

All complete applications will be reviewed by members of the Summer Institute Steering committee. HQP selected to attend will be contacted via email in mid-April, 2017.
